FuncDef: The multicast RTM is used for Reverse Path Forwarding checks. This command controls which IS-IS topology is used to populate the IPv4 multicast RTM.

ParaDef.Info: Causes IPv4 routes from the MT0 topology to be added to the multicast RTM for RPF checks.
Causes IPv4 routes from the MT3 topology to be added to the multicast RTM for RPF checks.
